channel.title: Chosen Pkz 317 | Perfect Combat | 525 emotes | 474 Interfaces!
channel.description:
[size=12pt][b]MADE THIS THREE YEARS AGO![/b][/size]
First off let me make this very clear, all of this is my work. I didn't leech one drop. So if your going to flame and say i leeched, i'll just remove.
Anwyays, i just made a Rune Server account today. A lot of you probably know me from Mopar Index. Well anyways about the server..
I've been working on this for quit some time now, and i am kinda of fading away from the old 317's. I am moving onto 459's. I have rewritten some of the combat, 50% of the combat is me!
Yes i know its Delta, but i don't see why people hate on Delta so much, tbh he chnaged RSPS's. Anyways lets get down to it.
[b]Combat System[/b] -Perfect Spell Delays -Instant Special attacks -Almost Perfect Combat -Special attacks don't reflect fake damage to yourself. -Npc Defense -Npc's freeze you, and you freeze them aswell. -Multi-Barrage spells. (Multi zones only). -Certain Npc's such as Apetoll Monkeys, heal themselfs. -50% if Npc's are animated. (General Graador is).
[i]The combat for this server is truly what stands out, i love any server with a good combat system! There truly is a lot of great features, i just don't have the time to explain them all.[/i]
[b]Emote System[/b] -525 walk, run, stand, block, punch, kick animations. -Godsword special attacks, stances, new anims. -Dragon claws, 525 special attack (4x). -Crossbow special attacks, Karil bow aswell. -Defender Block. -474Whip emote, can toggle on our off. -Barrelchest anchor, special, walk, run, block, stand. -New Dance emote -Vengeance & Vengeance Other -New runescape teleports, and runescape tele tabs. -Working rest emote, just doesn't recharge run.
[i]The emote system is truly something special for a Deltascape server, as you can see i have spent a good amount of time on emotes. I think a good emote system is what really makes a server stand out. [/i] [b]Minigames[/b] -Fun Pk 99% Change the Coords to wherever you like. -Barrows, 75% (Still working on loading tunnel maps, and working correct Chest). -Pest Control 100% Added PC Interface, and Npc's in PC game. -Assault, just the average Deltascape one, haven't worked on that. -Warriors Guild 75%, Only thing left to do is, make correct Npc's drop correct tokens for armour type. (Npc's load up). -Godwars, 100%, eventually wan't to load the real GWD maps.
[i]Minigames, i feel they make a huge impact on servers. Especially a stable non buggy game.[/i]
[b]Pictures[/b] Well i think i typed enough, i show you guys a few photos. Client [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/25ktutc.jpg[/img] Login Box [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/ja9xf6.jpg[/img] Punch [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ljssoy.jpg[/img] Reting emote [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ynh2lz.jpg[/img] Fully animated Dungeoneering Cape! [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/rubapy.jpg[/img] Vengeance & Vengeance Other [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/30bgpvn.jpg[/img] Fog [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/111tk7p.jpg[/img] New range animation [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2jry46.jpg[/img] Dragon Claw Run [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/ne8aa1.jpg[/img] Dragon Claw Special [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/egxuv9.jpg[/img] Armadyl Godsword [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/27wr42p.jpg[/img] Bandos Godsword [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/16c6edk.jpg[/img] Zammorak Godsword [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/28kn3pu.jpg[/img]
[B]Download[/B]
[ul][*]To be redirected to the download, click the button. [*]Once at [b]Multiupload[/b], choose one of the following Domains. [*][i]The download includes both the Server, Client[/i][/ul]
[url=http://www.multiupload.com/266QM0CLG1][img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2h2jel5.jpg[[/img][/url]
[B]Credits[/B] 50% Delta_ 40% Samuel (Me) 10% Moparscape Tutorials.

item.dc:creator: @krunt_V3 krunt V3
item.description:
@krunt_V3 wrote:

I am a delta Person for sure. (mainly cause pi is to confusing for me lol) but i have origional delta as my v1 source and i edited it for like 4 months and i love how it turned out but i hate the glitched pking on it so im going to test pking on your and if it is better then mine im going to remake my whole source using your base so that i have better pking lol(: THX(: and ill give you credit for sure(:

Read full topic

item.title: Chosen Pkz 317 | Perfect Combat | 525 emotes | 474 Interfaces!
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

I had a look at this and overall it looks quite nice.

For a complete base, it is quite empty in my opinion, and I don’t like having to tele everywhere using the spellbook as it can be quite confusing.

In my opinion, the character looks like he has pooped himself when he walks, but it’s nice to see something different.

Also I really hate to say this but this doesn’t have perfect combat. It still has the 2 second delay which, in a perfect combat system, would not happen.

Overall a very nice release especially for a delta server. Well done.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @deathrange07 deathrange07
item.description:
@deathrange07 wrote:

Looks epic. I got a question, and I have one I can answer for people that ask it:

  1. How do you change client IP? - Go to client, go down until you find EGUI (it’s not one with white page), and then change the 127.0.0.1 to your servers IP.
  2. Where do you find the Anti-Leech to remove?

Read full topic
